scripts.stylus: if [ ! -d stylus ]; then exit; fi; stylus -w -u nib -o css/ stylus/
scripts.build: npm run jade & npm run stylus & npm run coffee # or npm run webpack (*need for config)
scripts.start: npm run build & npm run watch
scripts.install: npm link coffee-script jade markdown stylus livereloadx webpack coffee-loader nib  # need to install globally
